content: "In this section, we will provide a descriptive statistical analysis of the key variables in our dataset. Descriptive statistics are used to summarize and describe the main features of the data, and provide a quick overview of the distribution and patterns within the dataset. By understanding the key characteristics of the data, we can identify trends and outliers, and gain valuable insights into the subject matter. In this analysis, we will focus on the mean, median, mode, standard deviation, and range, as well as other descriptive statistics such as percentiles, skewness, and kurtosis to give a comprehensive view of the data."
